reference.Rmd

Main

reference_package Create a data.frame with documentation metadata of one or more packages

Other

reference_concept Pick documentation matching some concepts.
s3_strip_class Strip the class part of attached S3 methods (do nothing with other functions).
search_docs Dataframe the documentation of installed packages.
